law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 797, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 1, effective January 1, 2010 -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 601, sec. 1, effective April 14, 1998. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 213, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992; and ch. 341, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.

metadata.lrc-note: (January 1, 2010). The Reviser of Statutes has altered the numbering of this statute from the way it appears in 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 1, under the authority of KRS 7.136(1)(c). (7/12/2006). In accordance with 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247, secs. 38 and 39, this statute has been renumbered as a section of the Kentucky Financial Services Code, KRS Chapter 286, and KRS references within this statute have been adjusted to conform with the 2006 renumbering of that code.
